ListItems.Child: • Teamed up with Covenant University Students to get cloths, bags and shoes distributed in IDP camps in Lagos state.

• Used c# and Unity to create a full casual Android game acessible on the play store. Implemented CI/CD using Azure Container instances, Docker and Github Actions to speed up workflow during development.
• Executed an Education grant of $1000 by the Woodward Center of Penn State Hershey Medical Center, Hershey, Pennsylvania. USA using .Net and office 365.
